member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerFilePathAttribute
member.summary: Allows you to obtain the full path of the source file that contains the caller. This is the file path at the time of compile.
member.remarks: This attribute is included to provide support for targeting .net 4.0 framework.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerLineNumberAttribute
member.summary: Allows you to obtain the line number in the source file at which the method is called.
member.remarks: This attribute is included to provide support for targeting .net 4.0 framework.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerMemberNameAttribute
member.summary: Allows you to obtain the method or property name of the caller to the method.
member.remarks: This attribute is included to provide support for targeting .net 4.0 framework.

member.summary: Writes log message to the specified message queue handled by MSMQ.

member.name: M:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The default value of the layout is: ${longdate}|${level:uppercase=true}|${logger}|${message}

member.name: M:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.Write(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.summary: Writes the specified logging event to a queue specified in the Queue parameter.
member.param: The logging event.

member.name: M:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.PrepareMessage(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.summary: Prepares a message to be sent to the message queue.
member.param: The log event to be used when calculating label and text to be written.
member.remarks: You may override this method in inheriting classes to provide services like encryption or message authentication.

member.name: P:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.Queue
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the queue to write to.
member.remarks: To write to a private queue on a local machine use .\private$\QueueName. For other available queue names, consult MSMQ documentation.

member.name: P:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.Label
member.summary: Gets or sets the label to associate with each message.
member.remarks: By default no label is associated.

member.name: P:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.CreateQueueIfNotExists
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create the queue if it doesn't exists.

member.name: P:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.Recoverable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use recoverable messages (with guaranteed delivery).

member.name: P:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding to be used when writing text to the queue.

member.name: P:NLog.Xml.Targets.MessageQueueTarget.UseXmlEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the XML format when serializing message.
